response.raw:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To enforce administration policies and rules governing students:

1. Clearly communicate expectations at the beginning of the year
2. Post rules visibly in the classroom
3. Be consistent in applying consequences
4. Use positive reinforcement for good behavior
5. Document incidents and interventions
6. Collaborate with administrators and parents when needed
7. Model appropriate behavior yourself
8. Regularly review and remind students of policies
9. Use age-appropriate explanations of rules and reasons behind them
10. Implement a fair and consistent discipline system
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
